short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a few pricing information on Skinbid items description fetched from Pricempire

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension adds a few extra info on items pages on Skinbid, based on live data extracted from Pricempire. This extension is not affialiated in any way to anything, it's totally independant and non official.

Features :
-  Display cheapest market name, price, and liquidity
- Display sticker prices
- Display an estimated price based on market price and stickers value
- Working on
  - Auctions
  - Direct buys

Source code : https://github.com/AlexMougenet/skinbid-x-pricempire/tree/main
Manual installation : https://github.com/AlexMougenet/skinbid-x-pricempire/tree/main?tab=readme-ov-file#installation
